QuestData.Title: Raging Spirits
QuestData.Description: The Auchenai have turned their backs on everything we used to stand for. They've taken to raising the dead as unholy minions!$B$BThis cannot stand. Put the spirits back to rest, and massacre those responsible for raising them into undeath.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 5 Angered Skeletons, 5 Raging Skeletons, and 3 Auchenai Necromancers, then return to the Tormented Soulpriest in Auchenai Crypts.
QuestData.RewardText: The dead belong in the spirit realm. Just as you belong in this one.
